Package src.views.components

Class TranslatedString

java.lang.Object
src.views.components.TranslatedString
All Implemented Interfaces:
LanguageChangeListener
public class TranslatedString extends Object implements LanguageChangeListener
The TranslatedString class represents a string that can be translated to different languages. It implements the LanguageChangeListener interface to listen for language change events. It works with buttons and labels.

      public TranslatedString​(String key)
      Constructs a TranslatedString object with the specified key. The text is updated based on the current language.
      Parameters:
      key - the key used to retrieve the translated text

      public TranslatedString​(String key, JButton button)
      Constructs a TranslatedString object with the specified key and button. The text is updated based on the current language.
      Parameters:
      key - the key used to retrieve the translated text
      button - the button to update with the translated text

      Gets the translated text.

    • updateText

      public void updateText()
      Updates the text based on the current language. If a button is specified, it updates the button text as well.
      Specified by:
      updateText in interface LanguageChangeListener
